title: The Birth of the 9th Circle Wizard - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Clever Protagonist   College/University   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Second Chance   Time Travel
author: 정룡필
description: Jung Soon-won, one of Korea’s top combat wizards in 2030. After waiting for his death after losing the battle against the Queen of Flames, he turned back time due to a gift from the Fairy King. But 30 years? 30 years? He has to start again in the second year of middle school!>
